name: Parkageddon
description:
Parkageddon: Do not feed the animals Is a goofy little phone App that I made with a friend all the way back in a  simpler time called 2014.

It plays in a window pretend you're playing it on a Galaxy S5 LOL.

Anyway, Right-click to "tap" or throw popcorn and feed the ever-rediculous animals that slowly come towards your Grandma.

Click the can of pennies in the upper right corner of the screen to scare away the animals if you're overwhelmed by their numbers.

Don't let anything get to grandma.

Hold down space to win if you extra suck at clicking.

It's getting uploaded just for Kicks  If you have fun That's good enough for us.

Credits:

Design, coding, voice acting, audio stuff:

Marcus Kraten

Additional coding, art, animation:
